name: places/ChIJMYJ-MVZZwokRKdkLwkFTjvY
formattedAddress: 1253 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10028, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1253 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10028, USA

originalText.text: Everyone - but Ling especially - is wonderful. I’ve had my nails done here many times and they always do an exceptionally good job and my manicure lasts a VERY long time. They are all very kind and professional and it’s a beautiful and very clean salon!

text.text: Everyone - but Ling especially - is wonderful. I’ve had my nails done here many times and they always do an exceptionally good job and my manicure lasts a VERY long time. They are all very kind and professional and it’s a beautiful and very clean salon!

originalText.text: Absolutely horrible service. Lowest tips I’ve ever given ! Lina that did my nails was not enjoyable to work with. She scratched and bumped my nails numerous times. My shape was simple and she kept making it crooked. I was so over it, I asked for clear nail polish to leave. I’m so dissatisfied.

text.text: Absolutely horrible service. Lowest tips I’ve ever given ! Lina that did my nails was not enjoyable to work with. She scratched and bumped my nails numerous times. My shape was simple and she kept making it crooked. I was so over it, I asked for clear nail polish to leave. I’m so dissatisfied.

originalText.text: As UES resident and as a someone who goes to nail salons regularly, I never felt so humiliated and embarrassed with this location - Jojo (who is usually by the reception desk, rectangular red/brown glassess, 165-168cm height) tried to finish my nail with top color that was different from my original color - with noticeable laziness and unprofessionalism - so I told her let's find a different color then. She didn't like the fact that I was changing my color, she pushed me away, shouted, and left. I had to get my color with different person. All in all, never felt so frustrated, humiliated, and at the end I was just laughing myself away with paying them with the tips. Nice work people, you guys made my day!

originalText.text: I’ve been contemplating for weeks whether I wanted to visit this location for a pedicure.  My brother and I decided we needed a self-care day so we gave this place a try.  From the moment we walked into the door we were greeted by the staff.  They were so courteous, pleasant, and professional.  There are so many colors to choose from.  There are several partitions up in between the pedicure stations and also the manicure stations.   The chairs used for a pedicure are massage chairs also with a cup holder if you happen to have a beverage.  There are also USB ports at the manicure and pedicure stations in case you need to charge your device.  The restroom is also very spacious and clean.  My pedicure was absolutely amazing!!!!!!!  The Locxmi did my pedicure and she was absolutely great.  She asked me was the water temperature okay and kept asking me was I okay in general.  Angela did my brother’s pedicure she was also great and was giving my brother tips for his feet.  While sitting under the dryer I even received about a 5-minute shoulder massage from Locxmi.  Once my nails were dry, oil was applied to my toes and plastic over it so I could put my shoes on.  They even offer a free membership where you earn points and for each $200 you spend you get $10 off.  I am so glad we decided to give this place a try.   I am so happy with my results; I will definitely be returning.

I am so happy with my results; I will definitely be returning.

originalText.text: Paid $70 for this and they wouldn’t fix it because it had been 10 days. Nails started cracking after day 2 and I was out of town so I couldn’t go into the salon to get it fixed. I’ve been getting powder for years and never experienced this after 4 weeks (let alone a few days). Don’t recommend.
